OOC:  Jeez, there's something wrong with this conversation.  It doesn't hav=
e
me in it!  No, just kidding, although I usually improve things  a lot wit=
h
my presence. =20

-------Original Message-------

From: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Date: August 02, 2002 07:03:35 PM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: Static...

OOC: It's fun to beat someone up, probably, but I'll wait until someone
at=
tacks me before breaking their ankles and nose. First ya gotta get them in
=
the testicles, though. That is, if they're a man. If it's a woman, you migh=
t
have trouble.

Hey, I know how it feels. I'm pretty evil myself. Previously I was just
st=
upid. It took me a year before I gained the wisdom and respect of the
other=
 RPGers. I had to earn that respect by not sucking. And it took a while
to =
learn that. Does anyone go back and look at my old posts? Don't make
sense,=
 do they?

You're not alone. I also constantly wanted people to just approve of my
RP=
Ging style and accept that I was getting better...

----- Original Message -----
From: Kyle Stewart
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Friday, August 02, 2002 6:54 PM
Subject: Re: Static...


In first grade 2 guys named A.J. Lamb and Chris Holly
did there best to turn everyone against me, and it's
still in effect to this day, so I developed virtually
no friends or social skill, and I'm generally overly
defencive and I am overly agressive, unsocial and have
it in my head I have to strike first before anyone can
pick on me.......why I am saying all this, I should
save it for my councilor.

--- Hollywood Narrator Countdown <thecode@...>
wrote:
> OOC: I admit you've improved in RPGING, but you
> showed up to thrash me for no reason. Not to mention
> that you repeatedly thrash LN in your posts. That's
> why people don't like you, it's not because they
> think you suck at role playing...
>=20

> they

> people

> the
>   way Yan said to keep this rpg going for another 25
>   years after he left, if we do, do you think we
> should
>   all get together in person and have a big party.=20
> Me
>   and LN could finally settle our differences with
> fists

> glock
>   and.....
>=20
